stateMatrix.text:
<p12>As Pheobe, Piper and Duke celebrated their win,
everything seemed to be fine. Crowds of people 
clapping. Cheers of their name echoed the arena.
All but one was joining in on the entertainment</p12>

<p12>With that, the mysterious figure grabbed the key
and identified the target</p12>

<p12>Ouch! That trip won't do my head any good 
since after comp last night</p12>

<p12>Tiffanny stared into the soulless eyes of TwistJam.
She questioned why he was laying on the floor. 
Not moving an inch</p12>
<p12>Twist? You there buddy? Come on Wake Up!</p12>
<p12>There is no need to be sleeping on the job</p12>

<p12>Tiffanny found a microphone on the nearby table
and let out a huge cry that echoed the arena. 
</p12>

<p12>Knowing that this year 's Tradeshow took a 
twisted turn of events, Dash called the police 
and ambulance</p12>
<p12>Hmm, what do you have for me Sam?</p12>

What were the techniques demonstrated 
in this scene?

What is the name of the Detective that 
spoke to Duke?
<p12>I'm going to see if I can help</p12>

<p12>{=#ppp} walks over to the body of TwistJam and
examines the body from behind the detective and
the medical examiner while listening in to what 
they were saying</p12>

<p12>Thank you Dr. Apple Figsbottom that was very
helpful</p12>

<p12>As the detective took down her statement, a
mysterious hand placed an envelope in the 
his pocket</p12>

<p12>Indeed, I've got a hunch about our "whudunnit" 
character is amongst the crowd</p12>
<p12>Hmm, wait, is that Duke over there?</p12>

<p12>Could be a good way to have an "insider" here
while we work the case</p12>

<p12>Detective Tequila smiled and waved over to where
Duke was with Pheobe and Piper</p12>

<p12>Tequila began walking over to Duke to give an 
update on the situation when suddenly Myra 
charged crash Tiffanny to the group and Tequila 
ended up face first in the nearby water feature</p12>

<p12>To be continued in the full version of the 
"Final Twist Off"</p12>
